original_text: The happy shouts and the noise of people who were weeping were both very loud. People far away could hear the noise. The different sounds mixed together, so nobody could say which was which.
korean_text: 백성이 크게 외치는 소리가 멀리 들리므로 즐거이 부르는 소리와 통곡하는 소리를 백성들이 분간하지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: The happy shouts and the noise of people who were weeping
so nobody could say which was which.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 어느 것이 어느 것인지 말할 수 없었다.
